reviews.comments: El departamento es hermoso,bien ubicado y Juan Carlos es muy buen host! Departamento altamente recomendable !!!

Ubicación perfecta, departamento de muy buen gusto y arreglado. Solo destacar como aporte que la calefacción en el estar y cocina es insuficiente. Por fin el pasillo de ingreso debería estar mas iluminado atento a que su longitud es importante y hay que subir dos pisos.

Excelente Departamento con todas las comodidades, muy espacioso y confortable. Es exactamente igual de como se ve en las fotografías. Juan Carlos se comporto de la mejor manera, muy atento y nos asesoro en todo lo que necesitábamos.  Sin dudas volvería a elegir el mismo departamento en un próximo viaje a bsas.
Hermoso el dpto y la atención de JC

El departamento es lindísimo, muy luminoso, super silencioso, amplio y bien decorado. La ubicación es ideal, cerca de restaurantes y parques.
Juan Carlos fue muy amable y estuvo pendiente de nosotros. Nos brindo muy buena información de la zona, donde ir a comer, etc.
Muy recomendable el departamento y el anfitrión!!!

Excelente apartamento y excelente ubicación. A media cuadra del cementerio de la Recoleta, a pasos de restaurants y boliches.
Los anfitriones brindan una excelente atención. Recomendadísimo!
El departamento muy lindo, cómodo y super bien ubicado! Se deben subir escaleras pero el departamento vale la pena!! Además, Juan Carlos nos recibió con mucha hospitalidad!
Muy luminoso, cómodo y bien ubicado. Casi sin ruido.
El departamento tiene una excelente ubicación y está super bien iluminado. Juan Carlos y Bernie siempre atentos. Gracias por todo!

Juan Carlos es una persona encantadora, amable y gentil. Nos ayudó en cada momento que lo necesitamos. Su departamento es simplemente genial, impecable! Sabanas y toallas como nuevas! Se agradece llegar a un espacio así! Lo recomiendo muchísimo. Además de muy bien ubicado! Gracias por todo
Todo excelente muy lindo departamento.
Bernie y Juan Carlos excelentes anfitriones, estarán siempre atentos de lo que necesites.
Excelente departamento, cómodo, buena ubicación, y Juan Carlos es un anfitrión ideal.

Todo excelente. Desde el inicio Tuvimos una comunicación muy fluida con Bernardo. Siempre muy atento. Cuando llegamos al departamento nos recibió Juan Carlos, al igual que Bernardo un agrado tratar con el. 
Respecto al departamento está muy bien ubicado, tiene todo cerca (supermercado, bancos, zona turística, etc). 
Lo recomiendo!

Este departamento en la La Recoleta es probablemente una de las mejores ubicaciones en Buenos Aires. Apto para turistas de alto nivel como para "mochileros" que se quieran recorrer la ciudad caminando o en bicicleta. El lugar está completamente dotado (incluso tiene mapas y planes turísticos) y es muy confortable. La ubicación es muy central y de fácil referencia. Está cerca a todo: restaurantes, museos, universidades, cafés, bares, etc. Recomiendo mucho este departamento. La zona es muy segura y residencial, apta para caminar a cualquier hora. Sin duda volveré.

Fue una muy buena experiencia, todo perfecto, el lugar , el departamento, host siempre presente y muy buena persona, lo raccomando a todos, no se puede preguntar mejor, el dep estas muy buen ubicado, locales bares y restaurantes muy cerca pero también muy tranquilo el lugar.
Gracias de todo, de verdad!!!

Juan Carlos estaba esperándonos para recibirnos y explicarnos cómo era el apartamento y respondió rápidamente siempre que tuvimos alguna duda.
El apartamento está en un segundo sin ascensor. Es bonito y está bien cuidado tal y cómo aparece en las fotos.

Juan Carlos es un auténtico caballero que estuvo ahí para recibirme y explicarme detalladamente el funcionamiento de este gran departamento. La única duda que tuve durante mi estancia la resolvió de inmediato e hizo que, en serio, me sintiera en casa.

El espacio es muy agradable. Luminoso y acogedor. Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar un tiempo cómodamente. Es exactamente igual a las fotos. Juan Carlos es muy organizado, atento y pendiente. Todo funciona como reloj.

Lo mejor que pudimos haber hecho en nuestro viaje a Buenos Aires fue hospedarnos en el depto de Juan Carlos: cómodo, muy bien ubicado, hermoso y Juan Carlos excelente anfitrión, pendiente de cada detalle. Si están considerando este lugar como una alternativa no duden en elegirlo, no se arrepentirán!! Mil gracias Juan por todo!!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Carolina por haber elegido
Mi casa . Fue un placer conocer a Uds y a tu simpático hijo Tomás !!

reviews.comments: Excelente todo,decoración con muy buen gusto,ubicacion óptima y todo completo.El anfitrión muy atento y dispuesto a solucionar cualquier problema lo que no fue necesario ya que todo anduvo perfecto.Volveríamos!

Juan Carlos estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y de todos nuestros requerimientos, con las mayor amabilidad y calidez posible. El departamento es tal cual las fotos, súper luminoso, limpio y con bonitos muebles. La ubicación es perfecta.
La verdad el apartamento excelente y la disposición de Juan Carlos impecable, el apartamento muy cerca de todo, muy seguro, con todas las comodidades y súper confortable

Juan Carlos fue un anfitrión increíble! Desde el día que alquilamos el departamento, se puso a nuestra disposición para cualquier duda y siempre estuvo atento a nuestro itinerario para ofrecernos su ayuda. El día que llegamos, nos recibió muy amablemente (hasta nos tenía una botella de agua fría en el refrigerador), nos explicó todo lo relativo al depa y nos dio tips de actividades que podíamos hacer en Buenos Aires. Durante nuestra estadía, mantuvimos una comunicación pronta y fluida y nos ayudó a resolver todo lo que le solicitamos. 

En cuanto al departamento, es precioso y súper cómodo! Tiene todo lo que uno necesita y tiene una excelente ubicación, en el precioso barrio de Recoleta, cerca de bares, restaurantes, un centro comercial paradas de buses. 

Recomiendo este apartamento 100% y agradecemos a Juan Carlos por todas sus atenciones :)
Muy bonito el departamento, con justo lo necesario, en una excelente zona y Juan Carlos muy atento y servicial , nos sentimos muy agusto.
Juan Carlos es muy amable y siempre estuvo al pendiente del viaje, el departamento hermoso y muy cómodo, con una excelente ubicación justo como lo necesitaba.

El apt es realmente espectacular. Tiene todas las comodidades, ademas está decorado con muy buen gusto y con todos los detalles cubiertos, te hace sentir como en casa. El barrio para mi uno de los mas lindos de BA, y la ubicación es perfecta.  Juan Carlos fue un gran anfitrión, muy atento y amable. Sin dudas que cuando regresemos a BA volveremos. Sls
Departamento muy cómodo tanto por distribución interior y decoración como por localización. Muy recomendable.

Increíble el apartamento, la ubicación perfecta, estaba muy limpio , con cable y conexión a internet. Me quedaría de nuevo en este sitio. 100% recomendado ; Juan Carlos fue un gran anfitrión y hasta tuvo la gentileza de llevarme al aeropuerto. El apartamento tiene una terraza y varias entradas de luz en u. Edificio muy silencioso y cómodo .

Fabulous vintage apartment in a great location in the middle of Recoleta. Juan Carlos recommended wonderful restaurants and a few other attractions. Really cool weekend artists market in the park half block away.  Will be back for sure. Really enjoyed my time with the Portenos!!

Very well located, clean and very comfortable,
Host was very kind and helpful with us, showing flexibility with our arrival/check in. All in all an a very good experience. We recommend this place to other guests and say this is a very good selection.
Was in BA for 5 days and working remotely during that time. Juan’s place has a good hosting atmosphere and fantastic location. Internet is fast to work remotely as well.

The apartment location is excellent, walking distance to most great things to see in BA. Just remember you’re staying next to the cemetery of the wealthy, the local cafés are gorgeous and well attended but pricier than anywhere else. JC gave us some great tips of what and when to see the local markets and followed up with us after some local events took place.

The flat is a gem. Great location, but seems very private and hidden when you are there. Well laid out and thoughtfully equipped with everything necessary. Very prompt replies to all queries and prompt attention to some very small matters we mentioned eg squeaky hinges. A great stay.

Juan Carlos place in Recoleta was central and near all the attractions. We were close to public transportation as well. 

The space is bright and charming.

The apartment is quiet and in a good location.  Juan Carlos responded quickly to our questions.  Only words of caution is that the apartment has some low ceilings in spots and if you aren’t careful, you can easily hit your head.

Beautiful, quiet apartment

Fantastic hosts: easy check-in, regular communication, helpful with recommendations  

Convenient location: Cemetery is VERY close, walking to other neighborhoods is an easy option 

I­t­ was our first time in Buenos Aires and this wonderful home made our trip extra special.

We had a very pleasant stay at Juan  Carlos' place. We will recommend this accomodation to everyone. Juan Carlos welcomed us at our arrival to show us the flat. The accomodation is very quiet et well arranged.

You know those places that you visit that help you fall in love with a city? This is that place. 

Your imagination will quickly romanticize Buenos Aires while living in a place as wonderful this. Set on a side street in recoletta, your steps away one side from the cemetery and touristy restaurants and bars, and high-end shops and local haunts on the other.  Any other area of BA is within walking distance. 

The apartment is spacious and well decorated, yet comfortable.  Lots of light, but you’re able to pull the shades for sleeping in. The building and the apartment are exceedingly safe.

Juan Carlos is helpful, flexible and eager to offer help. He speaks great English. He’s also unobtrusive.  Take his restaurant recommendations. Theyre outstanding. Would stay again. And again.
reviews.response:
Thank you very much Mike!! You have been a great host too!!
Hoping to see you soon again , cheers JC

reviews.comments: A light, pleasant and spacious flat, tastefully decorated, and close to a small supermarket and several cafes. Juan Carlos and Bernardo were very welcoming and helpful.  10 mins walk to subway station, on 2nd floor up stairs.  Highly recommended.

Excelente apartamento, localizado a menos de uma quadra da parte mais movimentada da Recoleta, mas sem ter nenhum ruído. Perto de supermercados, farmácias, lavanderias e restaurantes, além de ter um shopping que fica a 2 quadras.

O apartamento fica num segundo piso num prédio sem elevador, portanto quem tem problema em subir escadas não recomendo, pois são dois lances de escadas relativamente altos. 

Anfitrião muito solicito e simpático. 

O apartamento consiste de um hall, sala com cozinha americana e um banheiro e um pequeno jardim de inverno no primeiro piso e um quarto no mezanino (2o piso). No quarto tem uma cama de casal no tamanho de duas camas de solteiro e um armário com 3 portas que dá para bastante roupa, isto é, bastante confortável.

Tudo muito bem mobiliado e com todos acessórios necessários, além de ter um tamanho confortável e prático para duas pessoas. Muito iluminado e tranquilo, as fotos correspondem a realidade. 

Como o quarto está numa espécie de mezanino sobre a cozinha, pessoas muito altas, acima de 1,90 m podem ter dificuldade de se movimentar na cozinha e no quarto, já que o teto fica nesta altura.

This apartment is in a fantastic location and the price is very fair for the area. It's literally minutes from the famous cemetery. 

It is very spacious and well equipped. The bed is firm and comfortable. There plenty of storage space. The bathroom has a tub with shower and there is plenty of hot water. The kitchen features everything you would need if you wanted to prepare a meal.

Most importantly it's at the back of the building and very quiet. Yes there are stairs to ascend to the door but they are not that taxing. Be aware if you are tall. There is a step down to the kitchen where you may bump your head.

I LOVED this apartment!! I would stay here again in heartbeat. It's adorable, nicely decorated, has plenty of natural light, and feels like home. It's perfectly located a stone's throw from Recoleta Cemetary.  

Recoleta is a very nice neighborhood and if you like to walk, you can easily walk to most areas you'll want to visit in BA as a tourist. There are plenty of places to eat close by, including one of the traditional cafes, Café La Biela. There is small grocery store across the street which is perfect for picking up any items you want to have  at the apartment.

As a solo female traveler, I felt completely safe here. The apartment is on the top floor and can be double locked. The entrance to the entire building requires a key so there is plenty of security.

I wanted to stay at a place I could hang out at since I was also going to have to do some work from Buenos Aires. The wifi worked well and the atmosphere at the apartment was great for working. Overall, it is pretty quiet. I did hear people cheering during the Argentina-Venezuela football match and it brought a smile to my face knowing what nuts the locals are for their football!

If visiting during the cooler seasons (fall through spring), I'd recommend bringing a pair of slippers to wear around the apartment.

Juan Carlos and Bernie were communicative and helpful. Bernie met me for check-in and check-out was seamless. Bernie checked-in during my stay to make sure everything was going okay. They also have a taxi driver, Pablo, with whom they can arrange transportation for you to/from the airport for a reasonable price. 

You won't regret staying here! I will be back.

We loved our stay at Juan Carlos's Recoleta apartment! Everything was exactly like the pictures, and the location was perfect for walking all around the city. The co-host, Bernardo, checked us in and could not have been more helpful and welcoming. He even walked us around the corner to help us exchange money, which was a big help when we arrived exhausted from an overnight flight.  Bernie also checked in on us throughout our stay to make sure everything was going well and to offer recommendations (all of which were great). Can't recommend this place highly enough!
O apartamento é muito bom e bem localizado, no ultimo andar com acesso por escada. Espaço aconchegante. O Sr.  Juan Carlos foi muito solícito e gentil.
A very convenient location, next to many bars and restaurants. Juan Carlos and Bernardo were very communicative and helpful!

Ótima localização, limpo e muito organizado. Tem tudo que você precisar! A cozinha é muito bem equipada. A comunicação com Juan foi muito eficaz, ele estava muito disponível. Recomendo o (URL HIDDEN) certeza voltarei.

Ótima localização. Bairro impecável. Apartamento limpo e sem barulho. Recepção pelo Bernardo muito agradável e eficiente. 
Únicas considerações: prestar atenção na descrição sobre as escadas (2º andar) para quem for idoso ou tiver com malas pesadas e/ou crianças; são vários degraus e poucos deles em curva. E por último, apesar de bem limpos a roupa de cama e banho poderiam ser renovadas.
reviews.response: Marna, thanks very much for your valuable input.  Our announcement clearly states that it is on the 2nd floor by stairs.  We always help our guests to bring their luggage up when they arrive.  Regarding the towels and sheets we will immediately check to see the need for renovation.

reviews.comments:
It is a great experience, Carlo host us in personal with fruits, he gave us lots suggestions on foods and tour, also arrange airport pick up & drop.

The apartment located in recolate district, safe area, surround lots good restaurants and cafes, we enjoy it.
Ótima estadia. O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, arejado e ensolarado.
Great spot right in the heart of Recoleta! Perfect for walking around any part of the city. FYI - short ceilings other than the living room (I'm 6'4"/193cm and had to duck)
Hospedagem foi muito boa. Localização é maravilhosa. Anfitrião muito receptivo. Acesso limitado por uma longa escada (2 andares).

Apartamento amplo, ideal para um casal. Muito bem localizado - 1 quarteirão da entrada do cemitério, perto do Recoleta Mall e da praça que é cheia de restaurante, lojinhas. Bairro seguro pra andar a qualquer horário do dia e da noite. Quando vi que o apartamento era o número 10 me assustei, porque achava que iria ser no 10º andar. São apenas 3 lances de escada, muito tranquilo! 
Bernardo nos recepcionou e foi muito atencioso durante toda nossa estadia. O banheiro estava limpinho, com toalhas limpas. Recomendo!!
Exceptional communication, flexibility and friendliness. As for the property--a lovely apartment!

The apartment is located in Recoletta (beautiful old neighbourhood) and feels very safe. There is a mini mart right accross the road and numerous bars, restaurants and cafés right outside. 
The apartment itself is located on the top floor (stairs), is larger than the photos and immaculately clean. 
Would definitely stay there again. Communication with Juan Carlos and Bernie was excellent and we used Pablo their friend as a taxi to and from the airport, making it even easier.

This apartment and location were great.  It is located across the street from a grocery store and close to a pharmacy.  Eating places are within steps as well as a beautiful park that always had something going on.  The apartment is in an older building but the unit itself is great.  Has lots of windows, a small patio, small kitchen, and Two air conditioners which kept the place very cool and comfortable.  Will definitely use this unit again.

Juan and Bernie were the best.  Very helpful with arranging our stay and once we were here they went above and beyond.  Making reservations and securing transportation.  Could not ask for better hosts!  5 stars in our book!

This is a well organized loft apartment that is appointed with all the necessities and located very close to numerous sights in Recoleta.  It is walkable and busable to anything and in a safe area if the city.  We had a very good time here and the only caution would be that the stairs MAYBE tough for some who are our of shape like us!  Don't let that deter you!
Great location, close to a supermarket and restaurants. Host very accommodating for checking in and out. Apartment very comfortable with good Wi-Fi.
Great apartment in an extremely convenient location for museums, galleries and public parks. Hosts very helpful.

The apartment was great! 
The location is right beside the cemetery, shopping centre, and restaurants.
The apartment is as wonderful as per the pictures outline. It would be great to move in!
Contact was with Bernie, Juan Carlos's co host. He was very easy to contact. Bernie provided some good local food and bar recommendations. He also provided information on Spanish lessons. 
Would recommend the apartment to friends and family.

Juan Carlos' apartment in Recoleta is a GREAT place to stay. It is centrally located..3-minute walk to the Recoleta Cemetery or the bus stop for the Buenos Aires Tour Bus. It is also very close to the beautiful parks in the area. The apartment is roomy and has many windows allowing tons of natural light to come in. Juan Carlos was a great host. He took the time to show us around the apartment and gave us some great recommendations on what to do while in Buenos Aires.

Great apartment, clean, airy, great light and amazing location. Perfect for a home base. JC could not be more helpful and polite. I would stay here again. To know: if you like to cook, kitchen isn't stocked with basics, but there is a supermarket right across the street with reasonable prices.

Juan Carlos' apartment was ideal for our stay in that it was close enough to the city center and sites but at the same time quiet and private, with shops and restaurants handy. Very close to a BA Bus stop which was great for sight-seeing and good value with a 2-day pass. 
Juan Carlos himself was generous with his time and help in assisting with airport taxis and retrieving lost/delayed luggage. We would definitely recommend this place/host.

Lovely traditional apartment in a great area very close to the sights of the city. 

Juan was very helpful and the process was all made very easy.

Juan Carlos was superb - arranged for our airport pickup and transportation later to our cruise ship.  He gave us many helpful recommendations regarding restaurants, what to do in BA, and tips for our day trip to Colonia del Sacramento, Uruguay, including an excellent restaurant recommendation for lunch there.  The apartment is perfectly located in the wonderful neighborhood of Recoleta.  Everything you need is within a short walking distance, including a large supermarket, shopping, cafes, money exchange, etc.  We loved staying there and highly recommend it to anyone, with the caveat that there is no lift which might be an issue for some.

This an awesome place right next to the Recoleta mall and all the cafes and bars around it. The area is safe and quiet, easy to walk around or hop in a taxi. The place has lots of light and space and internet access. Juan was a wonderful and welcoming host, always available and made my stay great.

Juan Carlos and his partner met us as we arrived and gave us a great orientation (apartment and neighborhood) and were always available to answer questions.  The apartment is ideally situated in Buenos Aires, especially for walkers like us.  And it was bright and sunny and, with  the two levels, made the apartment feel very spacious.

This is a lovely and modern apartment housed in a retro building at the heart of Recoleta. We loved the location and the comforts provided by the host. The host was very engaged and checked on us often. This little apartment is perfect for couples. Keep in mind that the building has no elevators thus it is best suited for those who are fit. The location cannot be beat. There are so many restaurants within a block. Everything in the apartment is in working order

Juan Carlos went out of his way to welcome us and recommend interesting places to visit. This airbnb has a great location just half a block away from great restaurants, the historic cemetery, brew pubs, cafes and shady parks to relax in. I would recommend it whole heartedly.
JC arranged for a reliable and reasonable taxi driver to pick us up on our first arrival. Pablo also made additional trips to the local airport, one with a 3 AM pick up. What a man!
(SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) is widely used in BA and worth downloading before a visit

I cannot begin to express how perfect this apartment was! Juan Carlos was very communicative and made everything super easy. The apartment is exactly like the photos and the location is perfect - safe, convenient, and with all the things you need (supermarket, restaurants, bars, etc.). Thank you, Juan Carlos, I will always choose this place in my future visits to Buenos Aires.

Juan Carlos's place was perfect. It is centrally located but on a quiet street and building. The apartment is cozy and well suited for guests. Our contact, Bernardo, went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and ensured our stay was a pleasant one. Highly recommend this place.

O apartamento é excelente, espaçoso e de localização privilegiada, o que permitiu conhecer muitos dos pontos turísticos a pé. Muito limpo, arejado e iluminado, equipamentos de cozinha nos atendeu muito bem, ar-condicionado para os dias quentes e frios, ótima internet e muito conforto. Juan foi extremamente solícito e educado, nos deu muitas dicas, além de nos apoiar com transporte nos indicando o motorista Pablo, honesto e muito responsável. Foi uma das melhores viagens que fizemos e certamente Juan foi um dos responsáveis por essa percepção.

We got excellent instructions from Juan Carlos for getting there and he was on the sidewalk waiting to greet us as we arrived.  We had a lovely long stay and it really was a pretty great place to be!  The apartment is so nicely designed and decorated, we felt right at home.  The location is as good as it gets.  This AirBnB is the perfect choice for Recoleta.
Die Wohnung von Juan Carlos war einfach perfekt für unseren Aufenthalt in Buenos Aires.

Beautiful apartment in a great location, just a couple minutes to the Recoleta Cemetery and to many restaurants and a mall. Apartment was secure, nicely decorated and contained all the amenities needed for short or long stays (microwave, toaster, stove, oven, fridge, coffee maker etc). Juan was a great host with good communication before our trip and was accommodating when I called with a silly question . Highly recommended.

Juan Carlos and Ezequiel were very welcoming. Communication with Juan Carlos had also been very easy prior to our stay. We really appreciated the tips from Ezequiel about restaurants and places to visit. The apartment was beautiful and we would use it again in a heartbeat. The neighbourhood was probably also one of the best to stay in, two minutes from the Recoleta cemetery, but also walking distance to the Museo de Bellas Artes, a shopping centre, and many cute restaurants and shops. It was a great first introduction to Buenos Aires and recommend this apartment and Juan Carlos as a host without hesitation.

Apartment was great for my stay. Pictures accurately depict the apartment and it was in a good location for exploring the city. Would definitely recommend this apartment. Juan Carlos was very prompt in responding to my messages.
A estadia foi agradável. Juan Carlos nos deu todo apoio, inclusive providenciando transporte do Aeroporto até o apartamento, por meio do motorista Pablo. Local silencioso e tranquilo.

I have stayed at hotels, houses, and apartments all over the world and this was one of my absolute favorites. You cannot beat this apartment for value in terms of the location, gorgeous design, comfortable accommodation, and personalized atmosphere. The place is stunning. The location is right by the Recoleta cemetery and park, both iconic landmarks in a safe and upscale neighborhood, surrounded by tons of cafes and restaurants. There is no traffic noise at all, as it's on a quiet street and all windows overlook interior courtyards and patios. There is so much light (all windows with custom blinds), but also total privacy. It's on the third floor (second one above the entry level), but if you are ok with a few stairs it's not a big deal at all. Juan Carlos met me promptly, had everything ready, and helped me carry my suitcase. His English is perfect, and he very graciously welcomed me and showed me the apartment. He was super communicative and responsive throughout the whole planning process and trip. Wifi was really fast in the apartment. I can't say enough good things about this place.

Ficar hospedada no apartamento de Juan Carlos foi uma experiência incrível! A localização é excelente e o apartamento exatamente como nas fotos. Juan Carlos esteve o tempo todo disponível para nos ajudar com tudo que precisássemos. Recomendo muitíssimo a todos.

Great apartment in a fantastic location so close to the Recoleta cemetery which is beautiful and also so close to the shops with supermarket right across the road. Great restaurants also nearby and JC recommended some great eats and things to do around the area. The apartment itself has everything you need and is so nicely decorated with sunlight streaming through. It was such a nice stay. Big thanks to JC who was so sweet and a wonderful host in giving us all the information we needed and was there waiting patiently for us. Highly recommend!

Superbe emplacement dans le quartier. Hôte fort sympathique parlant 3 langues. Logement conforme à la description. À part le wifi inexistant et le chauffage/clim inutilisable,séjour agréable. Dès que ces inconvénients seront réparés : un petit loft idéal pour 2 ou 3 pers.

Beautiful apartment in an ideal location with a very helpful host. Downside was that BA is freezing at this time of year and heat pump was noisy but bring warm clothes and it's not a major. This is a great place to stay and a fabulous price. Thank you!

We had an excellent stay in Juan Carlos' apartment. Juan Carlos was flexible with our check in time as we arrived on an early flight to BA. He also arranged a taxi to collect us from the airport - and co-ordinated our departure from the city even though it was another early morning flight! It was great to be in contact with Juan Carlos even before arriving and his local knowledge is second to none, including the best restaurants and where to change money. The apartment is just as described, light and airy and we felt very at home. It is well situated with Recoleta Cemetery very close by and we were able to walk around Recoleta and navigate most of the city on foot - although we are keen walkers! We cannot recommend our stay highly enough.

Juan Carlos is a fantastic host--helping coordinate pickup from the airport and dinner at a "closed door" restaurant upon our arrival. He is kind and caring, and the apartment is beautiful!

We loved the flat and its stellar location in Recoleta, just down the block from the famous cemetery. There is a market across the street--couldn't be easier! Be sure to check out the Italian place around the corner! Amazing!

Juan Carlos met us at the location and brought our bags up to the apartment. He stayed in touched with us as we arrived in Buenos Aires and arranged to meet us in a comfortable location right next door. The apartment was as described and was extremely comfortable for us. 

The apartment is located in the Recoleta neighborhood of Buenos Aires, just a block away from the famous Recoleta Cemetery. It's also within walking distance to museums, shopping, great restaurants and tango!

Juan Carlos was attentive during our stay, offering help when we had a slight emergency toward the end of our stay.

Highly recommended! The only downside for anyone with difficulty walking is that you need to climb up to the 2nd level (51 steps) with the last stairwell a little curved and narrow.

JC is one of our favorite Air BnB hosts to date. We really appreciated his thoughtfulness as a host, and familiarity with the neighborhood. He had us covered for details we didn’t even think of yet which was greatly appreciated. The apartment was a one of a kind. It’s in an amazing location, and felt like sanctuary filled with natural light. We hope to stay here again next time we visit BA.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Emilse por vuestra simpatía y buena onda ! Espero volverlos a recibir pronto !

reviews.comments:
I was met at the door by Juan Carlos himself , who kindly helped me with luggage , oriented me to the area and provided me with the keys .
The apartment is well-appointed , modern and has full cooking facilities and micro-wave.
The area of the Recoleta is well recommended as being safe and interesting.

My fiance and I had an amazing stay at Juan Carlos' apartment in Recoleta. It really is the best location; we could see the wall of the cemetery from the outer door. The entire neighborhood of Recoleta was accessible by foot, and just a few blocks away was a main street to catch a bus into downtown. The apartment itself was just as shown in the pictures--bright and sunny, immaculately clean, and very comfortable. The kitchen is well stocked (I had no problem cooking meals) and the wifi worked very well. We didn't get to meet Juan Carlos but his friend Ezequiel met me for check in and was super available via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) for any questions or concerns. We would stay here again in a heartbeat. Thank you, Juan Carlos (and Ezequiel)!
reviews.response: Thank you Carmen ! It was a pleasure having you in my place !!

reviews.comments: Juan Carlos war wie schon bei unserem ersten Aufenthalt 3 Monate davor ein äusserst zuvorkommender und liebenswerter Gastgeber. Die Kommunikation war ausgezeichnet und er hat immer sehr schnell auf Anfragen und Anliegen reagiert. Er organisierte wiederum den Empfang am Flughafen sowie den Transfer zur Wohnung, wo er uns auch diesmal persönlich empfing. Die Wohnung ist grosszügig und in ausgezeichnetem Zustand sowie ausgezeichnet und ruhig im Zentrum gelegen (Recoleta). Einkaufs- und Verpflegungsmöglichkeiten verschiedenster Art gleich vor der Tür.

Juan Carlos was a fantastic host during my stay in Buenos Aires! He was on time (most important), very responsive when I asked him anything via the AirBnB app (usually an hour or less), detailed in the place and how everything works, and also had a private driver for pickup and drop off at Ezeiza (EZE) airport. What more could you ask for?!? Fantastic experience and will definitely be recommending JC's place to anyone who wants to visit BA.

We stayed for 2 nights in Juan Carlos' apartment and enjoyed our stay. It is clean and as described in the ad. The location is good and very close to the cemetery, and about 20 mins walk to the Centro. JC is a great host - he contacted us before we arrived and helped us organise an airport pickup and also met us on arrival to walk us through the apartment. Would recommend this apartment!

This was a terrific, light-filled apartment in the best and safest neighborhood in Buenos Aires (it is really just as it looks in the photos).  Because the apartment faces away from the street, you avoid having a lot of the street noise that can be an issue in many city apartments.  Juan Carlos was very attentive, helping us to both move in and move out and generously offering to store our bags for the day and get a "remis" (ride to the airport)  as we had a late flight departure.  He could not have been more helpful.  There are a couple of flights of stairs needed to access the apartment, which would be fine for anyone with a regular level of fitness.  Wi-fi service was excellent and the apartment has very good access to the major sites and neighborhoods of Buenos Aires.  We would definitely stay here again!

Juan é uma pessoa raríssima: atencioso e muito gentil. O apartamento é exatamente como apresentado nas fotos. Nos sentimos tão bem, neste lugar tão lindo e aconchegante que o mais difícil foi deixar o apartamento. Voltaremos em breve! Gracias Juan.

We arrived nearly one hour late at the apartment's house entrance, where Juan Carlos awaited us patiently. We still feel a bit guilty about that. However, Juan Carlos did not show any sign of anger and was as friendly and helpful as you can imagine.
The apartment is lovely, beautiful, very quiet, clean, comfortabel, perfect. Very good value.

We really enjoyed our stay in Juan Carlos's lovely apartment.  It's in a fantastic location, with plenty of shops, restaurants and cafes nearby (including la Biela, which does great coffee).  The apartment is just as described - light and airy and very peaceful. Lovely comfortable bed and nice living room area to relax in. Juan Carlos made us very welcome and arranged our taxi to the airport on the day we left too.
The apartment was very comfortable and in a great location. Juan Carlos was helpful with restaurant suggestions and a taxi driver for our ride to the airport. We would definitely stay here again!

Juan Carlos est un hôte incroyable qui dispose d'un très bel appartement bien situé dans le quartier de la Recoleta. Juan Carlos a à coeur de vous conseiller et d'apporter son aide pour la réussite de votre séjour à Buenos Aires. 
Une excellente adresse que je recommanderai pour un séjour dans la capitale Argentine.

We really enjoyed our 3-night stay at Juan Carlos's apartment in Recoleta! The apartment was as lovely as in its photos, and the location 1/2 block from Recoleta Cemetery was wonderful. 

For ice cream lovers - there's a Freddo at the end of the  block! There is a supermarket across the street, and a number of restaurants are nearby. 

We had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. We were especially grateful for the air conditioners upstairs (in the bedroom loft) and downstairs on the warm, humid days. 

Juan Carlos was a very hospitable host, and we would gladly stay here again.

Die Kommunikation mit Juan Carlos war problemlos und schnell. In der ruhigen und grosszügigen Wohnung, die den Bildern entspricht, fühlten wir uns sehr wohl. Der Taxiservice vom Flughafen war sehr praktisch. Gerne kehren wir im Mai ein 2. Mal in diese gut gelegene Wohnung (Einkaufsläden, Take-Aways, Restaurants alles um die Ecke) zurück. Wir freuen uns auch auf ein Wiedersehen mit Juan Carlos, ein herzlicher Mensch, der dir alle Informationen und Unterstützung gibt, die du benötigst.
